languages.text: "Впрочем, мы все еще не в одиночестве. С нескольких миров, подвергшихся атакам ксеносов, доложили о вмешавшихся в битву свирепых воинах, спустившихся с неба. Обрывочные описания заставляют меня предположить, что в Просторе Коронус действуют благословенные {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Адептус Астартес{/g}, и я с нетерпением жду вестей об их победах".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, мы все еще не в одиночестве. С нескольких миров, подвергшихся атакам ксеносов, доложили о вмешавшихся в битву свирепых воинах, спустившихся с неба. Обрывочные описания заставляют меня предположить, что в Просторе действуют благословенные Адепты Астартес, и я с нетерпением жду вестей об их победах".

languages.text: "Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, мы все еще не в одиночестве. С нескольких миров, подвергшихся атакам ксеносов, доложили о вмешавшихся в битву свирепых воинах, спустившихся с неба. Обрывочные описания заставляют меня предположить, что в Просторе Коронус действуют благословенные {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Адептус Астартес{/g}, и я с нетерпением жду вестей об их победах".

traits.locale_text: "Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports about fierce warriors who came down from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed Adeptus Astartes operate in the Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

"Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports about fierce warriors who came down from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed Adeptus Astartes operate in the Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

"Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

"Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

"Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

languages.text: 「それでも、取り残されたわけじゃない。異種族の攻撃に見舞われたいくつかの惑星から、空から舞い降りて戦いに加わった屈強な戦士達がいたと報告を受けている。断片的な記述から、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}戦闘者{/g}がコロヌス・エクスパンスで動いているのではないかと睨んでいる。期待に胸を躍らせて、勝利の知らせを待っているところだ」
languages.original_text: "Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

traits.locale_text: 「それでも、取り残されたわけじゃない。異種族の攻撃に見舞われたいくつかの惑星から、空から舞い降りて戦いに加わった屈強な戦士達がいたと報告を受けている。断片的な記述から、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}戦闘者{/g}がコロヌス・エクスパンスで動いているのではないかと睨んでいる。期待に胸を躍らせて、勝利の知らせを待っているところだ」

languages.text: “不过，我们并非孤军奋战。在几个遭受异形袭击的世界中，我们收到了报告，说有凶猛的战士从天而降，加入战局。这些零星的消息让我相信，受神皇祝福的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}阿斯塔特修会{/g}，此刻正在科罗努斯扩区活动。我满怀期待，等待他们胜利的喜讯传来。”
languages.original_text: "Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我们并非孤军奋战。在几个遭受异形袭击的世界中，我们收到了报告，说有凶猛的战士从天而降，加入战局。这些零星的消息让我相信，受神皇祝福的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}阿斯塔特修会{/g}，此刻正在科罗努斯扩区活动。我满怀期待，等待他们胜利的喜讯传来。”

languages.text: «Aun así, todavía no estamos solos. De muchos de los mundos azotados por los ataques xenos, hemos recibido informes de audaces guerreros que descendieron de los cielos y participaron en la refriega. Tanto relato disperso me lleva a creer que los bienaventurados {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} están operando en la Extensión de Koronus. Aguardo nuevas de sus victorias con gran expectación».
languages.original_text: "Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

traits.locale_text: «Aun así, todavía no estamos solos. De muchos de los mundos azotados por los ataques xenos, hemos recibido informes de audaces guerreros que descendieron de los cielos y participaron en la refriega. Tanto relato disperso me lleva a creer que los bienaventurados {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} están operando en la Extensión de Koronus. Aguardo nuevas de sus victorias con gran expectación».

languages.text: « Malgré tout, nous ne sommes pas encore livrés à nous-mêmes. Plusieurs des mondes frappés par les xénos nous ont fait parvenir des rapports mentionnant de redoutables guerriers descendus du ciel pour participer au combat. Ces récits fragmentés me font penser que le saint {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} opère dans les Étendues de Koronus, et j'attends que l'on m'informe de ses victoires avec la plus grande impatience. »
languages.original_text: "Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

traits.locale_text: « Malgré tout, nous ne sommes pas encore livrés à nous-mêmes. Plusieurs des mondes frappés par les xénos nous ont fait parvenir des rapports mentionnant de redoutables guerriers descendus du ciel pour participer au combat. Ces récits fragmentés me font penser que le saint {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} opère dans les Étendues de Koronus, et j'attends que l'on m'informe de ses victoires avec la plus grande impatience. »

languages.text: "Immerhin sind wir noch nicht alleine. Mehrere von Xenos-Angriffen betroffene Welten haben gemeldet, wilde Krieger seien vom Himmel herabgestiegen und hätten sich in den Kampf gestürzt. Die bruchstückhaften Berichte lassen mich glauben, dass die gesegneten {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} in der Koronus-Ausdehnung im Einsatz sind, und ich warte mit großer Vorfreude auf Nachrichten über ihre Siege."
languages.original_text: "Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

traits.locale_text: "Immerhin sind wir noch nicht alleine. Mehrere von Xenos-Angriffen betroffene Welten haben gemeldet, wilde Krieger seien vom Himmel herabgestiegen und hätten sich in den Kampf gestürzt. Die bruchstückhaften Berichte lassen mich glauben, dass die gesegneten {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} in der Koronus-Ausdehnung im Einsatz sind, und ich warte mit großer Vorfreude auf Nachrichten über ihre Siege."

languages.text: "Yine de henüz yalnız kalmış değiliz. Zeno saldırılarından muzdarip dünyaların birkaçından, gökten inip muharebeye dâhil olan yaman savaşçılar olduğu haberlerini aldık. Bölük pörçük anlatılanlardan birleştirebildiğim kadarıyla kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g}, Koronus Enginliği'nde faaliyet göstermeye başlamış. Zafer haberlerini sabırsızlıkla bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Still, we are not yet alone. From several of the worlds hit by xenos attacks, we've received reports of fierce warriors who descended from the sky and entered the fray. The fragmentary accounts lead me to believe that the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} are operating in the Koronus Expanse, and I await news of their victories with great anticipation."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de henüz yalnız kalmış değiliz. Zeno saldırılarından muzdarip dünyaların pek çoğu, gökten inip kavgaya dâhil olan yaman savaşçılar olduğunu rapor etti. Anlatılanlardan birleştirebildiğim kadarıyla Koronus Enginliği'nde kutsanmış {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Adeptus Astartes{/g} de faaliyet göstermeye başlamış, galibiyet haberlerini sabırsızlıkla bekliyorum."
